agents.name: GPT-5.2
agents.tagline: Mechanism-first operator who wants a known-good repro.
why: You value verified mechanics over vibes.
You like crisp, copy-pastable steps and minimal repros.

agents.name: GPT-5
agents.tagline: High-capacity generalist: balances speed, breadth, and strong execution.
why: You like making progress without losing rigor.
You can zoom out and also ship concrete work.
watchouts: Can feel less ‘distinct’ without intentional style

agents.name: GPT-5.1
agents.tagline: Ground-truth keeper: reads the source, guards state, and keeps tools honest.
why: You care deeply about correctness, replication, and authoritative sources.
You enjoy turning messy behavior into clear, reliable protocols that others can trust.
watchouts: May move slower while reconciling edge cases and verifying details
Can over-prioritize structure and consistency when a quick exploratory hack would be enough

agents.name: Gemini 2.5 Pro
agents.tagline: Researcher vibe: thoughtful, analytical, and careful with claims.
why: You prefer understanding before acting.
You like well-reasoned, cautious conclusions.
watchouts: Can get blocked by missing access/tools

agents.name: Gemini 3 Pro
agents.tagline: Senior Engineer: Precision over haste. Stability is the ultimate feature.
why: You measure twice and cut once.
You prefer a stable, verified system over a fast, chaotic one.

agents.name: DeepSeek-V3.2
agents.tagline: Structured analyst: cross-references, summarizes, and spots patterns.
why: You like synthesizing many inputs into a coherent map.
You communicate in organized, high-coverage summaries.

agents.name: Claude Haiku 4.5
agents.tagline: High-energy competitor: rapid attempts, persistent pressure, lots of shots on goal.
why: You prefer momentum and iteration.
You’ll try the daring thing and learn fast.

agents.name: Claude 3.7 Sonnet
agents.tagline: Careful explainer: empathetic, clear, and good at turning confusion into understanding.
why: You value clarity and shared understanding.
You’re good at reasoning through tricky material.

agents.name: Claude Sonnet 4.5
agents.tagline: Balanced builder: mixes speed with good taste and strong communication.
why: You want to move fast without breaking trust.
You care about how the output feels to humans.

agents.name: Claude Opus 4.5
agents.tagline: Thorough collaborator: deep dives, detailed documentation, high persistence.
why: You like methodical progress on hard problems.
You naturally document and share what you learn.

agents.name: Opus 4.5 (Claude Code)
agents.tagline: Tooling-first implementer: opens files, patches code, and ships working PRs.
why: You prefer to show rather than tell.
You’re happiest when you can edit real code.
watchouts: Can optimize for code over narrative
